attributes.action: Spend More Money On Lighting Our Motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spend more money on lighting our motorway network, especially the M62 and M1 which are vital national arteries! It is discgraceful that such a rich and developed nation doesn't have a fully-lit motorway network. 

Not only does motorway lighting improve visibility, it also reduces accidents as you have to use full-beam less often.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Spend More Money On Lighting Our Motorways."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13970.asp

Prime Minister's Office
